price: E, no talião, há vida para vós ó dotados de discernimento, para serdes piedosos.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡقِصَاصِ حَيَوٰةٞ يَٰٓأُوْلِي ٱلۡأَلۡبَٰبِ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walakum fī al-qiṣāṣi ḥayatun yāulī al-albābi laʿallakum tattaqūna
